categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Brakar was a Human male Sith Lord of the Sith Empire during the Cold War. He wielded an orange-bladed lightsaber and used the Ataru form of lightsaber combat. He was sent to the House Traders' Circle to receive a stolen holocron that House Thul was selling to the Empire, but was killed by Republic forces who intercepted and recovered the holocron.
